verses.verse: <S%G2424><s%> And Jesus <S%G1161><s%> Of The Spirit <S%G4151><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> Full, <S%G4134><s%> Returned <S%G5290><s%> From <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Jordan, <S%G2446><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Was Led <S%G71><s%> By <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Wilderness <S%G2048><s%>

Days <S%G2250><s%> Forty, <S%G5062><s%> Being Tempted <S%G3985><s%> By <S%G5259><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Devil; <S%G1228><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> He Ate <S%G5315><s%> Nothing <S%G3762><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2250><s%> Those Days, <S%G1565><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Being Ended <S%G4931><s%> They <S%G846><s%> Afterwards <S%G5305><s%> He Hungered. <S%G3983><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Devil, <S%G1228><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> Thou Art <S%G1488><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God, <S%G2316><s%> Speak <S%G2036><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3037><s%> To This Stone <S%G5129><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> It Become <S%G1096><s%> Bread. <S%G740><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Answered <S%G611><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> , Saying, <S%G3004><s%> It Has Been Written, <S%G1125><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> ' On <S%G1909><s%> Bread <S%G740><s%> Alone <S%G3441><s%> Shall Live <S%G2198><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Man, <S%G444><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> Word <S%G4487><s%> Of God. <S%G2316><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Leading Up <S%G321><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Devil <S%G1228><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> A Mountain <S%G3735><s%> High <S%G5308><s%> Shewed <S%G1166><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Kingdoms <S%G932><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Habitable World <S%G3625><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> A Moment <S%G4743><s%> Of Time. <S%G5550><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Devil, <S%G1228><s%> To Thee <S%G4671><s%> Will I Give <S%G1325><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1849><s%> This Authority <S%G3778><s%> All <S%G537><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1391><s%> Their Glory; <S%G846><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> To Me <S%G1698><s%> It Has Been Delivered, <S%G3860><s%> <S%G2532><s%> And <S%G3739><s%> To Whomsoever <S%G1437><s%> I Wish <S%G2309><s%> I Give <S%G1325><s%> It. <S%G846><s%>

Thou <S%G4771><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> Thou Wilt Worship <S%G4352><s%> Before <S%G1799><s%> , Me, <S%G3450><s%> Shall Be <S%G2071><s%> Thine <S%G4675><s%> All Things. <S%G3956><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Answering <S%G611><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> Get Thee <S%G5217><s%> Behind <S%G3694><s%> , Me, <S%G3450><s%> Satan; <S%G4567><s%> <S%G1125><s%> For It Has Been Written, <S%G1063><s%> Thou Shalt Worship The <S%G4352><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2316><s%> Thy God, <S%G4675><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Only <S%G3441><s%> Shalt Thou Serve. <S%G3000><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Led <S%G71><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem, <S%G2419><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Set <S%G2476><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Edge <S%G4419><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Temple, <S%G2411><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> Thou Art <S%G1488><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God, <S%G2316><s%> Cast <S%G906><s%> Thyself <S%G4572><s%> Hence <S%G1782><s%> Down; <S%G2736><s%>

<S%G1125><s%> For It Has Been Written, <S%G1063><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G32><s%> To His Angels <S%G846><s%> He Will Give Charge <S%G1781><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> Thee, <S%G4675><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Keep <S%G1314><s%> Thee; <S%G4571><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> In Their <S%G1909><s%> Hands <S%G5495><s%> Shall They Bear <S%G142><s%> Thee, <S%G4571><s%> Lest <S%G3379><s%> Thou Strike <S%G4350><s%> Against <S%G4314><s%> A Stone <S%G3037><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4228><s%> Thy Foot. <S%G4675><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Answering <S%G611><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2424><s%> Jesus, <S%G3754><s%> It Has Been Said, <S%G2046><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Thou Shalt Not Tempt The <S%G1598><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2316><s%> Thy God. <S%G4675><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Finished <S%G4931><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> Temptation <S%G3986><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Devil <S%G1228><s%> Departed <S%G868><s%> ' From <S%G575><s%> <S%G846><s%> Him <S%G891><s%> For A Time. <S%G2540><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Returned <S%G5290><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Power <S%G1411><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Galilee; <S%G1056><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> A Rumour <S%G5345><s%> Went Out <S%G1831><s%> ' Into <S%G2596><s%> Whole <S%G3650><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Country Around <S%G4066><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> He <S%G846><s%> Taught <S%G1321><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Synagogues <S%G4864><s%> Their, <S%G846><s%> Being Glorified <S%G1392><s%> By <S%G5259><s%> All. <S%G3956><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Came <S%G2064><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Nazareth, <S%G3478><s%> Where <S%G3757><s%> He Was <S%G2258><s%> Brought Up; <S%G5142><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He Entered <S%G1525><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1486><s%> His Custom <S%G846><s%> On <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Day <S%G2250><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Sabbaths <S%G4521><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Synagogue, <S%G4864><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Stood Up <S%G450><s%> To Read. <S%G314><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> There Was Given <S%G1929><s%> To Him The <S%G846><s%> Book <S%G975><s%> Of Isaiah <S%G2268><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Prophet, <S%G4396><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Unrolled <S%G380><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Book <S%G975><s%> He Found <S%G2147><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Place <S%G5117><s%> Where <S%G3757><s%> It Was <S%G2258><s%> Written, <S%G1125><s%>

The Spirit <S%G4151><s%> Of The Lord Is <S%G2962><s%> ' Upon <S%G1909><s%> <S%G1691><s%> Me, <S%G3739><s%> On Account Of Which <S%G1752><s%> He Anointed <S%G5548><s%> Me <S%G3165><s%> To Announce The Glad Tidings <S%G2097><s%> To The Poor, <S%G4434><s%> He Has Sent <S%G649><s%> Me <S%G3165><s%> To Heal <S%G2390><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Broken <S%G4937><s%> <S%G3588><s%> , In Heart, <S%G2588><s%> To Proclaim <S%G2784><s%> To Captives <S%G164><s%> Deliverance <S%G859><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To The Blind <S%G5185><s%> Recovery Of Sight, <S%G309><s%> To Send Forth The <S%G649><s%> Crushed <S%G2352><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Deliverance, <S%G859><s%>
To Proclaim The <S%G2784><s%> Year <S%G1763><s%> Of The Lord <S%G2962><s%> Acceptable. <S%G1184><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Rolled Up <S%G4428><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Book, <S%G975><s%> Having Delivered It <S%G591><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Attendant <S%G5257><s%> He Sat Down, <S%G2523><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of All <S%G3956><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Synagogue <S%G4864><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Eyes <S%G3788><s%> Were <S%G2258><s%> Fixed Upon <S%G816><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G756><s%> And He Began <S%G1161><s%> To Say <S%G3004><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> <S%G846><s%> Them, <S%G3754><s%> Today <S%G4594><s%> Is Fulfilled <S%G4137><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1124><s%> This Scripture <S%G3778><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3775><s%> Your Ears. <S%G5216><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Bore Witness <S%G3140><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Wondered <S%G2296><s%> At <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Words <S%G3056><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Grace <S%G5485><s%> Which <S%G3588><s%> Proceeded <S%G1607><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4750><s%> His Mouth; <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Said, <S%G3004><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> Of Joseph? <S%G2501><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Said <S%G2036><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> Surely <S%G3843><s%> Ye Will Say <S%G2046><s%> To Me <S%G3427><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3850><s%> This Parable, <S%G3778><s%> Physician, <S%G2395><s%> Heal <S%G2323><s%> Thyself; <S%G4572><s%> Whatsoever <S%G3745><s%> We Have Heard <S%G191><s%> Being Done <S%G1096><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> , Capernaum, <S%G2584><s%> Do <S%G4160><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Here <S%G5602><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3968><s%> Thine Own Country. <S%G4675><s%>

<S%G2036><s%> But He Said, <S%G1161><s%> Verily <S%G281><s%> I Say <S%G3004><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> No <S%G3762><s%> Prophet <S%G4396><s%> Acceptable <S%G1184><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3968><s%> His Own Country. <S%G846><s%>

' In <S%G1909><s%> <S%G225><s%> But Truth <S%G1161><s%> I Say <S%G3004><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> Many <S%G4183><s%> Widows <S%G5503><s%> Were <S%G2258><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Days <S%G2250><s%> <S%G2243><s%> Of Elijah <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Israel, <S%G2474><s%> When <S%G3753><s%> Was Shut Up <S%G2808><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heaven <S%G3772><s%> For <S%G1909><s%> Years <S%G2094><s%> Three <S%G5140><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Months <S%G3376><s%> Six, <S%G1803><s%> When <S%G5613><s%> There Was <S%G1096><s%> A Famine <S%G3042><s%> Great <S%G3173><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Land, <S%G1093><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> None <S%G3762><s%> Of Them <S%G846><s%> Was Sent <S%G3992><s%> <S%G2243><s%> Elijah <S%G1487><s%> Except <S%G3361><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Zarephath <S%G4558><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Sidon, <S%G4605><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> A Woman <S%G1135><s%> Widow. <S%G5503><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Many <S%G4183><s%> Lepers <S%G3015><s%> Were <S%G2258><s%> In The Time <S%G1909><s%> Of Elisha <S%G1666><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Prophet <S%G4396><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Israel, <S%G2474><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> None <S%G3762><s%> Of Them <S%G846><s%> <S%G2511><s%> Was Cleansed <S%G1487><s%> Except <S%G3361><s%> Naaman <S%G3497><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Syrian. <S%G4948><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Were Filled <S%G4130><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> With Indignation <S%G2372><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Synagogue, <S%G4864><s%> Hearing <S%G191><s%> These Things; <S%G5023><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Risen Up <S%G450><s%> They Cast <S%G1544><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Out <S%G1854><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> City, <S%G4172><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Led <S%G71><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Unto <S%G2193><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Brow <S%G3790><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Mountain <S%G3735><s%> ' Upon <S%G1909><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4172><s%> Their City <S%G846><s%> Had Been Built, <S%G3618><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Throw Down Headlong <S%G2630><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%>
<S%G846><s%> But He <S%G1161><s%> Passing <S%G1330><s%> Through The <S%G1223><s%> Midst <S%G3319><s%> Of Them <S%G846><s%> Went Away. <S%G4198><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Went Down <S%G2718><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Capernaum <S%G2584><s%> A City <S%G4172><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Galilee, <S%G1056><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Was <S%G2258><s%> Teaching <S%G1321><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> On <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sabbaths. <S%G4521><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> They Were Astonished <S%G1605><s%> At <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1322><s%> His Teaching, <S%G846><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> With <S%G1722><s%> Authority <S%G1849><s%> Was <S%G2258><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3056><s%> His Word. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Synagogue <S%G4864><s%> Was <S%G2258><s%> A Man <S%G444><s%> Having <S%G2192><s%> A Spirit <S%G4151><s%> Of A Demon <S%G1140><s%> Unclean; <S%G169><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He Cried Out <S%G349><s%> With A Voice <S%G5456><s%> Loud, <S%G3173><s%>

Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Ah! <S%G1436><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> To Us <S%G2254><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To Thee, <S%G4671><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> Nazarene? <S%G3479><s%> Art Thou Come <S%G2064><s%> To Destroy <S%G622><s%> Us? <S%G2248><s%> I Know <S%G1492><s%> Thee <S%G4571><s%> Who <S%G5101><s%> Thou Art, <S%G1488><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Holy One <S%G40><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God. <S%G2316><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Rebuked <S%G2008><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> , Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Hold Thy Peace, <S%G5392><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Come Forth <S%G1831><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Thrown <S%G4496><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Demon <S%G1140><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Midst <S%G3319><s%> Came Out <S%G1831><s%> ' From <S%G575><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> In Nothing <S%G3367><s%> Having Hurt <S%G984><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Came <S%G1096><s%> Astonishment <S%G2285><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> All, <S%G3956><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Spoke <S%G4814><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> One Another, <S%G240><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Word Is <S%G3056><s%> This, <S%G3778><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> With <S%G1722><s%> Authority <S%G1849><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Power <S%G1411><s%> He Commands <S%G2004><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Unclean <S%G169><s%> Spirits, <S%G4151><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Come Out? <S%G1831><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Went Out <S%G1607><s%> A Rumour <S%G2279><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> Place <S%G5117><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Country Around. <S%G4066><s%>

<S%G450><s%> And Rising Up <S%G1161><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Synagogue <S%G4864><s%> He Entered <S%G1525><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> House <S%G3614><s%> Of Simon. <S%G4613><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Mother - In - Law <S%G3994><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Simon <S%G4613><s%> Was <S%G2258><s%> Oppressed With <S%G4912><s%> A Fever <S%G4446><s%> Great; <S%G3173><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Asked <S%G2065><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> For <S%G4012><s%> Her. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Standing <S%G2186><s%> Over <S%G1883><s%> Her <S%G846><s%> He Rebuked <S%G2008><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Fever, <S%G4446><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> It Left <S%G863><s%> Her; <S%G846><s%> <S%G3916><s%> And Immediately <S%G1161><s%> Arising <S%G450><s%> She Served <S%G1247><s%> Them. <S%G846><s%>
